login.tokenNotFound: Sorry, unable to find your token, we can not validate your request.

first_connection.title: First connection
first_connection.success: Update completed. You could now log in with your username and password
first_connection.hasAlreadyPassword: Can not update. This user already has a password.
first_connection.passwordNotMatch: Sorry, passwords do not match. Password must contain at least 8 characters.

home.title: Create or select a Project and an Application.
home.subtitle: We take care of the rest !
home.ytmodalcontent: To get started, follow our tutorials and quickly learn how to use the Newmips generator.

editor.intro2: You can select a file on the sidebar on your left ;)
editor.intro3: You can press F11 in the editor to enter the fullscreen mode!

ui_editor.page_saved: Your new design have been saved

settings.sure_reset: Are you sure ? You will logout, your password will be reset and you\'ll receive an email to set a new one.
settings.activate_translation: Activate automatic translation (Internet connection and valid Google API Key is required)

preview.title: Preview
preview.help-disabled: Slack chat is disabled. Activate it in config/global.js and provide slack information in config/slack.js

logo.title: Add a logo
logo.text: Please add your logo just below (Recommended size 180px x 100px) :
logo.add: The new logo has been successfully added.
logo.remove: The logo has been successfully removed.
logo.noLogo:
Sorry but you do not currently have a logo, you can add one with the instruction:

application.label: Application
application.not_started: There is no application running. Select one in the list.

error.textone: You should contact your system administrator, and you can
error.404: The link you followed may be broken, or the page may have been removed.
error.valueTooLong: The given value is too long (>30).
error.cannotFindInstruction: Sorry, I do not understand what you're asking of me.

chat.welcomeold: Welcome ! Please type your instructions in input field below or type 'help' if you need any support.
chat.welcome:
Hello and welcome ! I'm Mipsy, your personnal creation assistant. At any time, I am here to help you discover the Newmips generator.
To get started, here are few instructions that you can run below:

- add entity Person
- add field Name
- add field Birthday with type date

And follow us on our dedicated YouTube channel, you will find our playlist of video tutorials to learn in details how to use the Newmips generator:
Newmips tutorials

notFound.withThisID: Sorry, but there is no project with this ID : %s.
notFound.withThisName: Sorry, but there is no project with this name : %s.

notFound.withThisID: Sorry, but there is no application with this ID: %s.
notFound.withThisName: Sorry, but there is no application with this name: %s.
notFound.withThisCodeName: Sorry, but there is no application with this code name: %s.

application.alreadyExist: Sorry, but an application already exist with this name: %s.

create.success:
You have just added a new module %s (%s)
To delete it, type the instruction:
- delete module %s.
create.alreadyExist: A module with the same or similar name %s already exists.

notFound.withThisID: Sorry, but there is no entity with this ID : %s.
notFound.withThisName: Sorry, but there is no entity with this name : %s.
notFound.noModuleInApp: Sorry, there is no module in this application.
notFound.notFoundHomeModule: Cannot find home module in the application with the ID %s.

notFound.notFoundedInModule: Sorry, no component with the name %s exist in the module with id %s.

delete.success: The component has been successfully deleted!
delete.error: An error occured during the component deletion.

create.success:
You have just added a new entity %s (%s) in the module %s. To delete it, type the instruction:
- delete entity %s.
create.alreadyExist: Entity with the same or similar name %s already exists.
create.addComponent: Cannot add component on entity, no entity with code name %s found.

get.idNotDefined: Entity ID is not defined. You should select or create an entity before.

notFound.withThisID: Sorry, but there is no entity with this ID : %s.
notFound.withThisName: Sorry, but there is no entity with this name : %s.
notFound.withThisCodeNameAndModule: Sorry, but there is no entity with this code name : %s in the module : %s.

error.selectOrCreateBefore: You have to select or create an entity before.
error.alreadyExist: Sorry, a field with the same or similar name (%s) already exists.

create.created:
You have just added a new field %s (%s) to the entity %s.
To delete it, type the instruction:
- delete field %s
To make it unique:
- set field %s unique
To make it mandatory:
- set field %s mandatory

notFound.withThisID: Sorry, but there is no field with this ID : %s.

restart.error: Couldn't start server due to critical error.

gitPull.success: The application has been successfully loaded!

gitCommit.success: The commit has been successfully done!

error.alreadyInProcess: Sorry, a git process is already processing. Please wait until he finishes to execute a new git instruction.
error.notDoGit: You choose to not do git in config/gitlab.json, so this instruction will do nothing.

error.notHome: You can't delete the home module.

attributes.notUnderstandGiveAvailable:
Sorry, I do not understand what you want to do. Available attributes:
%s
attributes.notUnderstand: Unable to understand the given attribute.
attributes.fieldNoFound: No field with name %s found in the current entity.
attributes.duplicateUnique: Sorry, the field has already duplicate value so it can't be unique.
attributes.missingValues: Error, you have to specify the values you want in the field with type enum / radio.
attributes.noSpace: Error, please seperate each enum / radio value with a comma.
attributes.sameValue: Error, you can't specify 2 times the same value for an enum / radio field.

association.deleteTab: The tab %s has been successfully deleted.

hasOne.successEntity:
A tab «%s» has just been added to the entity %s.
You will be able to access this tab by showing a %s.
To delete this tab, type the instruction:
- delete tab %s
hasOne.successSubEntity:
A tab «%s» has just been added to the entity %s.
Warning this tab refers to a sub-entity, so it does not appear in the menu.
You will be able to access this tab by showing a %s.
To delete this tab, type the instruction:
- delete tab %s

hasMany.successEntity:
A new tab «%s» has been created on entity %s.
You can use this tab by showing the entity %s.
To delete this tab, type the instruction:
- delete tab %s
hasMany.successSubEntity:
A new tab «%s» has been created on the entity %s.
Warning this tab refers to a sub-entity, so it does not appear in the menu.
You can use this tab by showing the entity %s.
To delete this tab, type the instruction:
- delete tab %s

hasManyExisting.success: New relation has many existing with entity %s created on %s.

relatedToMultiple.success: New field %s related to multiple %s created on %s.

relatedTo.missingField: The field %s in the entity %s does not exist or is not usable.

error.alreadyHasMany: Source entity already has many target entity, impossible to create belongs to association.
error.alreadyHasOne: Source entity already has the association has one with target entity, so it's impossible to add has many association.
error.alreadyRelatedTo: Source entity already has a related to field with target entity, so it's impossible to add a related to multiple field with this target.
error.alreadySameAlias: Association already exists between these entities with this alias.
error.circularBelongsTo: Bad entity association, you can't set circular has one association.
error.circularHasMany: Bad entity association, you can't set circular has many association.
error.alreadyBelongsToMany: Sorry, a belongs to many association already exist between these entities.
error.tooMuchHasMany: Sorry, too many association 'has many' from target to source, impossible to create belongs to many association.
error.unableTab: Unable to find %s tab in current entity.

error.alreadyExistOnEntity: Sorry, a component with this name is already associate to this entity in this module.
error.alreadyExistInApp: Sorry, an other entity with this component name already exist in this application.
error.alreadyExistOnModule: Sorry, a component with this name is already associate to this module.
error.notExisting: Sorry, but this component does not exist on the current entity.
